|oui_eth=AC:86:74 }}[http://www.open-mesh.com/index.php/products/om2p.html On '''Open-Mesh''''s store] :[https://www.open-mesh.com/skin/frontend/default/open-mesh/images/om2p.pdf Datasheet for the OM2P series] :[http://dashboard.open-mesh.com/datasheets/om2p.pdf .. and an additional datasheet] Specifications, per '''Open-Mesh''''s datasheet, follow.. '''Transmit Power''' *11n, MCS0: 26dBm (400mW) *11n, MCS7: 21dBm (125mW) '''Receive Sensitivity (Typical)''' *11n, MCS0: -95dBm *11n, MCS7: -91dBm '''Power over Ethernet *not 802.3af/at compatible *Passive PoE feed *12-18VDC over pins +4,5 and -7,8 [https://openwrt.org/toh/openmesh/om2p On the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://robin.forumup.it/about5411-robin.html Boot log on the '''ROBIN''' forums] :Indicates AR9285 is used, which is not surprising
